ygData.subject: Re: Good loot
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Milk is much cheaper then water so stick with it. Dont travel too much so you will not spend much money on food but it is best to keep all what you get and
ygData.messageBody:
At 14.15 26/07/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
>Stick with hunting semi-intellegent creatures. (Gnolls, kolbolds, Goblins,
>Orcs, etc). Avoid the natural critters. Don't buy anything but spells,
>muffins and water (it won't help you anyway). Never pass up a decaying

Milk is much cheaper then water so stick with it. Dont travel too much so
you will not spend much money on food but it is best to keep all what you
get and to find one place near a shop so you can go to qeynos hills and
hunt there and sell all what you get as soon as possible. Nice if not a
little dangerus place is a south karana and PAW dangeon you must bring much
milk and food but all other you can sell at nearby centurion village and
there is all time enough high lv people to cast SOW or other buffs on you
to solo god.


>skeleton without zapping it, expecially in Northern Ro. Group up, you will
>make money faster that way.
